name: Yummy Skin 4-Ever Flushed Lip and Cheek Set
about: What it is: An all-in-one value set including two full sizes and two deluxe minis of the award-winning Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushed. Highlighted Ingredients: - Upsalite: Absorbs excess sebum and sweat while maintaining skinu2018s hydration..- Olive-Derived Squalane: Supports oil production and diminishes visible signs of aging..- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Indulge in the 4-Ever Flushed Kit featuring Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushed in two limited-edition and two existing, award-winning shades. Infused with upsalite technology for unrivaled oil absorption, this buildable, soft-matte formula visibly blurs and smooths cheeks and lips with all-day wear...This Set Contains:.- 2 x 0.21 oz/ 6 g Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushed - Matte Colors for Cheek & Lip in Dancing Queen (vivid plum), Limited Edition Spiced Latte (warm brown).- 2 x 0.11 oz/ 3 g Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushed - Matte Colors for Cheek & Lip in Jubilee (soft terracotta), Limited Edition Red Velvet (vibrant red)
ingredients: -Upsalite: Absorbs excess sebum and sweat while maintaining skinu2018s hydration..-Olive-Derived Squalane: Supports oil production and diminishes visible signs of aging..-Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates skin...Magnesium Carbonate, Isohexadecane, C13-15 Alkane, Isododecane, Dimethicone, Squalane, Synthetic Wax, Synthetic Candelilla Wax, Kaolin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Glyceryl Behenate, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Polyethylene, Stearoxy Dimethicone, (+/-):Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 28 (CI 45410), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Red 40 (CI 16035).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swirl your fingers or a brush into the color..-Press onto cheeks and lips. .-Tap and blend for a fearless flush..-Repeat process until desired color intensity is achieved.

reviews.review_title: If it ever restocks, grab it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An awesome deal on a fantastic product in 4 shades. Pigmentation is to die for (tread lightly), finish is lifelike and non-sticky, wear is all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was an amazing mini set purchase. Ive been waiting to try theses balms for months & I wasnu2019t disappointed. Creamy easy to use On allover. Beautiful colors. 10/10 Im so glad i purchased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best holiday gift The value in itself is great. I love you get variety of browns red magenta and beige colors. I dont use it on my lips but on the cheek they last all day with mKeup setting soray

reviews.review_title: I need more. I need it all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I danessa to release the limited edition shades as regular shades because spice latte is absolutely stunning the perfect bronze blush for when you want to tone down day. And the red blush also works great as a lip, but has gotten me so many compliments.

reviews.review_title: Maybe if you have clear skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. But it was hard to work it, itu2019s not something that you can just take on your brush and blend, because pigmented you have to be careful in loading up your brush equally and then put it on your face. Even then it still moves my foundation. Iu2019ve tried it before and after powder, after powder works better for me but still can get patchy. It also clung to dry and texture on your skin. I have pitted scars and PIE due to acne and i felt like it magnified my hyperpigmentation and scars more, but is otherwise somewhat blurring on the clear parts of my face. This was such a bummer because i seriously loved the shades and wanted to use the product so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is lovely and long lasting. I like the shades and how small the minis are. They are perfect for touchups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great blushes, very pigmented and beautiful finish. They are a little hard to work with at first since they are very pigmented but once you figure that out they are amazing. Not patchy and nice and glowy

reviews.review_title: Wanted this to work so bad!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted this to work because the colors are beautiful and this set is such a good deal but no matter what I do, they show up really patchy, and cling to my dry areas and textures. I have oily dehydrated skin. Sadly had to return this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I already had one blush in this formula that I do love, but was excited when this came out with three colors I was very interested in and 2 of the three I was interested in are full sized. The price for value of this set is amazing! I like the inclusion of Jubilee as it's not one I'd have tried otherwise and I don't think I'd ever need more than this mini size. Dancing queen is gorgeous, but I do have to go a tad light handed as I'm very fair, but I'm sure it would look gorgeous on others with a darker complexion. Now Spiced Latte is gorgeous, a perfect fall warm brown. it is nude but still such a nice blush color and so easily wearable! But Red Velvet is what I bought the set for! I love a red blush, on my fair skin I can get that perfect Snow White/Disney Princess blush. I only wish this was a full size too... I do hope it eventually comes out as a full size!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. This set is a fantastic deal. It comes with new shades. I love the formula of these blushes as an oily skin gal. I like to use on my cheeks and lips for a monochromatic, flushed look. And the minis are just too cute! They are great for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best blush collection for the price. Extremely pigmented so a little bit goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying this...I wanted to love these so bad. The price for what you get it amazing. I just didn't like them AT ALL. No matter what I used to apply them, they clung to any dry patch and looked patchy. Sadly, they were returned and I will keep looking for the perfect blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are simply fabulous- have them in EVERY color!  This set is an excellent value!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the variety of colors in this set. The formula is beautiful and long-lasting. the blush blends beautifully and set in place looking very natural. The pigmentation is really good hence you have to be careful of how much intensity you want and apply accordingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the fact I must drive an hour to purchase is crazy. I work 2 jobs.  why did u offer me this product if you couldn't DELIVERY. LITTLE LITTERLY.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was sold out once already so I highly recommend just getting it while it's here. I love this blush formula, and the colors are great, versatile and clean! I feel like this is the besy holiday set this year!!ud83dudc4d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really happy with the selection of shades in this package and the performance of the products. They are pigmented but easy to blend out u2013 or build up u2013 and give a slightly blurring quality to my skin with good wear time. I'm also able to layer and blend some of the complimentary shades together (like spiced chai and jubilee) to create depth and customized looks. The set is friendly for different ranges of skin tones too like my olive, medium complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades at an amazing price. Great color selection

reviews.review_title: Such a great deal and amazing quality!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had these blushes on my wish list to try. As soon as I seen this set I bought immediately. I wouldn't be surprised if this sells out. The formula was as good as I thought it would be. I love the shades. They literally stay all day. I love the shades that were chosen. The minis are super cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador and this is my authentic and genuine review of this product. I purchased this with my own money. I love the long lasting formula of these blush pods. I prefer to tap them into place and blend them out with a sponge. The color stays with me all day. These are highly pigmented and a little goes a long way. The colors can go very lightly but will easily build to an intense color if you want.  The value of this set is phenomenal and would be a fantastic gift. I love the cute minis, I wouldn't be surprised if we see the 2 new released shades become permanent editions to her blush family. I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing set! Colors, products, price, everything is on pointud83dudc4c

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set, and it's a great value. There are two very fairly neutral shades, and two pops of color - this is giving me ideas of layering the them - apply the more muted color more fully on the cheek, then accent the forward & upper parts of your cheeks with the pop of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice set. As a woman with a darker complexion, I just wish she didn't add two colors that almost look the same on me. I also really like the minis for just taking along with you. A pop on the cheeks and lips and just go! The price is great for what you get as well. This is a really nice gift for self or someone else.
